trans-unit.source: Monitor Azure web app performance
trans-unit.target: Monitor Azure web app performance

trans-unit.source: Chart load and response time, dependency information and set alerts on performance.
trans-unit.target: Chart load and response time, dependency information and set alerts on performance.

trans-unit.source: Monitor Azure web app performance
trans-unit.target: Monitor Azure web app performance

trans-unit.source: In the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link> you can set up monitoring to collect the statistics and details on the application dependencies in your <link><linkText>Azure web apps</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: In the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link> you can set up monitoring to collect the statistics and details on the application dependencies in your <link><linkText>Azure web apps</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Azure supports Application performance monitoring (or, APM) by leveraging extensions.
trans-unit.target: Azure supports Application performance monitoring (or, APM) by leveraging extensions.

trans-unit.source: These extensions are installed into your application and collect the data and report back to the monitoring services.
trans-unit.target: These extensions are installed into your application and collect the data and report back to the monitoring services.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights and New Relic are two of the performance monitoring extensions that are available.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights and New Relic are two of the performance monitoring extensions that are available.

trans-unit.source: To use New Relic, you install an agent at runtime.
trans-unit.target: To use New Relic, you install an agent at runtime.

trans-unit.source: To use Application Insights, you rebuild your code with an SDK; and you can also install an extension that provides access to additional data.
trans-unit.target: To use Application Insights, you rebuild your code with an SDK; and you can also install an extension that provides access to additional data.

trans-unit.source: The SDK lets you write code to monitor the usage and performance of your app in more detail.
trans-unit.target: The SDK lets you write code to monitor the usage and performance of your app in more detail.

trans-unit.source: Enable an extension
trans-unit.target: Enable an extension

trans-unit.source: Click Browse and select the web app or virtual machine you would like to instrument.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse and select the web app or virtual machine you would like to instrument.

trans-unit.source: Add the Application Insights or the New Relic extension.
trans-unit.target: Add the Application Insights or the New Relic extension.

trans-unit.source: If you're instrumenting a web app:
trans-unit.target: If you're instrumenting a web app:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Settings, Extensions, Add, Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Settings, Extensions, Add, Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Or if you're using a virtual machine:
trans-unit.target: Or if you're using a virtual machine:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click the Analytics tile</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click the Analytics tile</linkText>

trans-unit.source: For Application Insights: rebuild with the SDK
trans-unit.target: For Application Insights: rebuild with the SDK

trans-unit.source: Application Insights works by installing an SDK into your app.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights works by installing an SDK into your app.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, add the Application Insights SDK to your project.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, add the Application Insights SDK to your project.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Right-click the web project and choose Add Application Insights</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Right-click the web project and choose Add Application Insights</linkText>

trans-unit.source: When you're asked to login, use the credentials for your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: When you're asked to login, use the credentials for your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: You can test the telemetry by running the app in your development machine, or you can just go ahead and republish it.
trans-unit.target: You can test the telemetry by running the app in your development machine, or you can just go ahead and republish it.

trans-unit.source: The SDK provides an API so that you can <link><linkText>write custom telemetry</linkText><title></title></link> to track usage.
trans-unit.target: The SDK provides an API so that you can <link><linkText>write custom telemetry</linkText><title></title></link> to track usage.

trans-unit.source: Explore the data
trans-unit.target: Explore the data

trans-unit.source: Use your application for a while to generate some telemetry.
trans-unit.target: Use your application for a while to generate some telemetry.

trans-unit.source: Then, from your web app or virtual machine blade, you'll see the extension installed.
trans-unit.target: Then, from your web app or virtual machine blade, you'll see the extension installed.

trans-unit.source: Click on the row that represents your application to navigate to that provider:
trans-unit.target: Click on the row that represents your application to navigate to that provider:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Click Refresh</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Click Refresh</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can also use Browse to go directly to the Application Insights component or New Relic account that you used.
trans-unit.target: You can also use Browse to go directly to the Application Insights component or New Relic account that you used.

trans-unit.source: Once you get to the blade, for Application Insights, for example, you can:
trans-unit.target: Once you get to the blade, for Application Insights, for example, you can:

trans-unit.source: Open Performance:
trans-unit.target: Open Performance:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>On the Application Insights overview blade, click the Performance tile</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>On the Application Insights overview blade, click the Performance tile</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Drill through to see individual requests:
trans-unit.target: Drill through to see individual requests:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>In the grid, click a dependency to see related requests.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>In the grid, click a dependency to see related requests.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Here's an example that shows the amount of time spent in a SQL dependency including the number of SQL calls and related statistics such as the average duration and standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: Here's an example that shows the amount of time spent in a SQL dependency including the number of SQL calls and related statistics such as the average duration and standard deviation.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor service health metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor service health metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Enable monitoring and diagnostics</linkText><title></title></link> to collect detailed high-frequency metrics on your service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Enable monitoring and diagnostics</linkText><title></title></link> to collect detailed high-frequency metrics on your service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever operational events happen or metrics cross a threshold.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever operational events happen or metrics cross a threshold.

trans-unit.source: Use <link><linkText>Application Insights for JavaScript apps and web pages</linkText><title></title></link> to get client analytics about the browsers that visit a web page.
trans-unit.target: Use <link><linkText>Application Insights for JavaScript apps and web pages</linkText><title></title></link> to get client analytics about the browsers that visit a web page.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor availability and responsiveness of any web page</linkText><title></title></link> with Application Insights so you can find out if your page is down.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
